s.label: Image settings
s.desc: These settings are used when running the OSKAR imager. Note that the OSKAR imager in its current form is not recommended for general use: visibilities should normally be written to a Measurement Set for imaging in CASA or other software.

s.label: Field-of-view [deg]
s.desc: Total field of view in degrees.

s.label: Image dimension [pixels]
s.desc: Image width in one dimension (e.g. a value of 256 would give a 256 by 256 image).

s.label: Image type
s.desc:
The type of image to generate. Note that the Stokes parameter images (if selected) are uncalibrated, and are formed simply using the standard combinations of the linear polarisations:
I = 0.5 (XX + YY)
Q = 0.5 (XX - YY)
U = 0.5 (XY + YX)
V = -0.5i (XY - YX)
The point spread function of the observation can be generated using the PSF option.

s.label: Channel snapshots
s.desc: If true, then produce an image cube containing snapshots for each frequency channel. If false, then use frequency-synthesis to stack the channels in the final image.

s.label: Channel start
s.desc: The start channel index to include in the image or image cube.

s.label: Channel end
s.desc: The end channel index to include in the image or image cube.

s.label: Time snapshots
s.desc: If true, then produce an image cube containing snapshots for each time step. If false, then use time-synthesis to stack the times in the final image.

s.label: Time start
s.desc: The start time index to include in the image or image cube.

s.label: Time end
s.desc: The end time index to include in the image or image cube.

s.label: Image centre direction
s.desc:
Specifies the direction of the image phase centre.
If Observation direction is selected, the image is centred on the pointing direction of the primary beam.
If RA, Dec. is selected, the image is centred on the values of RA and Dec. found below.

s.label: Image centre RA (degrees)
s.desc: The Right Ascension of the image phase centre. This value is used if the image centre direction is set to 'RA, Dec.'.

s.label: Image centre Dec. (degrees)
s.desc: The Declination of the image phase centre. This value is used if the image centre direction is set to 'RA, Dec.'.

s.label: Input OSKAR visibility data file
s.desc: Path to the input OSKAR visibility data file.

s.label: Output image root path
Save FITS image
s.desc: If true, save the image in FITS format.

s.label: Overwrite existing images
s.desc:
If true, existing image files will be overwritten. If false, new image files of the same name will be created by appending an number to the existing filename with the pattern:
  <filename>‑<N>.<extension>,
where N starts at 1 and is incremented for each new image created.
